description.original: Typewriter scrolling, highlighting of the current line, dimming of unfocused paragraphs, writing focus and more.
description.translation: Typewriter scrolling, highlighting of the current line, dimming of unfocused paragraphs, writing focus and more.

dict..setDesc(`The color of the current line: .setDesc(`当前行的颜色在${this.themeMode}主题中突出显示`)
dict..setDesc(\"The amount of lines to always: .setDesc("始终保持在当前行之上和之下的行数")
dict..setDesc(\"How to dim paragraphs / sente: .setDesc("如何在光标不在的笔记/编辑器中淡化段落/句子（例如，如果您在拆分窗格中打开了多个笔记）")
dict..setDesc(\"Choose to dim unfocused parag: .setDesc("淡化非聚焦的段落或句子的选项")
dict..setDesc(\"Positions the typewriter line: .setDesc("将当前行定位在屏幕的指定百分比处")
dict.settingDesc=\"This enables or disables a: settingDesc="这将启用或禁用以下所有功能"
dict.settingDesc=\"Activate the focused line: settingDesc="仅在与编辑器第一次交互后激活聚焦行高亮显示和段落变暗"
dict.settingDesc=\"Turns typewriter scrolling: settingDesc="打开或关闭打字机滚动"
dict.settingTitle=\"Only maintain typewriter: settingTitle="仅在达到时激活打字机"
dict.settingDesc=\"The line that the cursor i: settingDesc="光标所在的行在达到指定的打字机偏移量之前不会滚动到编辑器的中心。这会删除编辑器顶部的额外空间"
dict.settingTitle=\"Do not snap typewriter wi: settingTitle="方向键不触发打字机滚动"
dict.settingDesc=\"The typewriter will only s: settingDesc="打字机不会因使用方向键而滚动，除非按下插件的滚动命令，滚动命令默认为 Cmd/Ctrl+ArrowUp/ArrowDown, 但是你可以在Obsidian设置自己的快捷键."
dict.this.addText(\"Not available if typewrit: this.addText("如果激活了【打字机滚动】则不可用")
dict.settingDesc=\"When enabled, always keeps: settingDesc="启用后，始终保持窗口中至少存在指定数量的行在当前行的上方和下方"
dict.settingDesc=\"This places a gradient on: settingDesc="这会使当前行的上下段落逐渐淡化，使文本向编辑器的顶部和底部淡出"
dict.settingTitle=\"Highlight current line on: settingTitle="仅在聚焦的笔记中高亮当前行"
dict.settingDesc=\"Only show highlighted line: settingDesc="（如果您在拆分窗格中打开了多个笔记）仅在光标所在的笔记中高亮行"
dict.settingDesc=\"Dim unfocused paragraphs /: settingDesc="淡化未聚焦的段落/句子"
dict.settingDesc=\"If this is enabled, the pa: settingDesc="如果启用此选项，活动列表项的父项不会淡化"
dict.settingTitle=\"Undim all table cells whe: settingTitle="编辑时取消所有表格单元格的淡化"
dict.settingDesc=\"If this is enabled, all ta: settingDesc="如果启用此选项，则编辑表格时所有表格单元格都不会变暗。如果禁用此选项，仅显示您正在编辑的单元格，而其他单元格保持淡化。"
dict.settingDesc=\"If this is enabled, paragr: settingDesc="如果启用此选项，滚动时文本不会淡化"
dict.settingTitle=\"Limit maximum number of c: settingTitle="限制每行的最大字符数"
dict.settingDesc=\"Limits the maximum number: settingDesc="限制每行的最大字符数"
dict.settingDesc=\"If enabled, the header wil: settingDesc="启用后，专注模式中将显示标题"
dict.settingDesc=\"If enabled, the status bar: settingDesc="启用后，专注模式中将显示状态栏"
dict.settingDesc=\"If enabled, the Obsidian w: settingDesc="启用后，Obsidian界面将在专注模式下切换到全屏"
dict.settingDesc=\"Add a vignette to the edge: settingDesc="专注模式下，在屏幕边缘增加阴影"
dict.settingDesc=\"If enabled you will get a: settingDesc="如果启用，每当安装新版本的Typewriter Mode时，您都会收到带有发行说明的通知"
dict.this.addText(\"Not available if \\\"keep: this.addText("如果激活了【在顶端和底端保留行】则不可用")
dict.settingDesc=\"If this is enabled, paragr: settingDesc="开启后，在选择文本时段落/句子不会被淡化"
